name: Super Yum Yum 2
summary: Join Leon the Chameleon as he journeys to save his family from the belly of Tum Tum, in the sequel to the BAFTA nominated smash hit for mobile Super Yum Yum. Our hero Leon has come home from his latest fruit licking mission in Pond Town, to find that greedy Tum Tum has gobbled up all of Leon's baby chameleons along with his winter fruit supply!! Leon must follow the trail of fruit and babies across Jungle, Beach, Pond worlds and eventually blasting off into Space, in order to confront Tum Tum and rescue all of his little ones.
